statements: UPDATE ad_targeting SET ad_clicks = 10 WHERE ad_id = 123;
UPDATE ad_targeting SET behavior_data = 'interested' WHERE user_id = 456;
UPDATE ad_targeting SET ad_clicks = 10, ad_category = 'Technology' WHERE user_id = 123 AND ad_id = 456;
UPDATE ad_targeting SET behavior_data = 'Tech Enthusiast', ad_clicks = ad_clicks + 1 WHERE user_id = 456 AND ad_category = 'Sports';
UPDATE ad_data SET ad_clicks = ad_clicks + 1 WHERE ad_id = 1234;
UPDATE ad_data SET ad_name = 'New Ad Title', ad_cost = 75.99 WHERE ad_id = 5678;
UPDATE ad_data SET ad_cost = 500.50, ad_clicks = ad_clicks + 1 WHERE ad_id = 123
UPDATE ad_data SET ad_name = 'Summer Sale Ad', ad_type = 'Discount', ad_category = 'Fashion', ad_clicks = 10 WHERE ad_id = 456
UPDATE user_behavior_data SET behavior_type = 'click' WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE ad_campaigns SET end_date = '2023-12-31' WHERE campaign_id = 456;
UPDATE user_behavior_data SET timestamp = '2022-09-15 08:30:00' WHERE user_id = 123 AND behavior_type = 'click';
UPDATE ad_targeting SET targeting_score = 0.8 WHERE user_id = 456 AND behavior_type = 'purchase';
UPDATE user_profile SET age = 25, name = 'John Doe' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE ad_campaign SET budget = 5000.00, start_date = '2022-01-01' WHERE campaign_id = '43e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE user_profile SET age = 30, gender = 'Male', location = 'New York' WHERE user_id = '3b4e1b83-27a3-44ed-8a34-0fd55caba55a';
UPDATE ad_campaign SET budget = 15000.50, start_date = '2022-03-15', end_date = '2022-09-30' WHERE campaign_id = '9a9d4e81-4c60-4d7c-8c67-346f70db935e';
UPDATE users SET age = 30, email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE user_location SET city = 'New York', country = 'USA' WHERE user_id = 456;
UPDATE users SET age = 30, gender = 'Male' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE user_preferences SET category = 'Sports', subcategory = 'Football' WHERE user_id = 1;
